title: StepShot v4.0.0.1387
description:
StepShot v4.0.0.1387

Screen Capturing
Multiple or single screenshots are automatically produced on the mouse clicks

Metadata
Multilingual instructional info (e.g. â€œLeft click on â€œSaveâ€ buttonâ€) is captured automatically.

Smart Capturing
One merged screenshot with all sequenced actions is captured when clicking several times in one window

Sequential screenshots
Easily capture the sequence of your steps. StepShot will follow your cursor and every click will produce either single or multiple screenshots.
Automatically capture multilingual instructional information, as well as merged screenshots with sequenced actions when clicking several times in one window

Image Annotation
Add text and edit images with shapes, blurred regions and more

Manuals
Combine multiple articles to export and publish them as one document

Image Annotation and Editing
Annotate images with title and description, as well as add focus to them with easy and powerful editing tools!
Draw rectangles, ellipses, lines, arrows, highlights, sequence numbers, blurred regions on the top of captured screenshot.

Manuals and Articles
Workspace is a virtual space where all your articles and manuals are stored.
Manual combines Articles grouped by chapters. Manual can be exported and published as one document.

Exporting
Export to MS Word, PDF, HTML, DITA and XML

Publishing
Publish to Confluence, WordPress, SharePoint and easyDITA

Exporting
Documents can be exported to Microsoft Word, PDF, HTML pages, DITA and any XML-based formats.

Publishing
Ready-to-share documents can be published to Confluence, WordPress, SharePoint and easyDITA portals.

Official Website: http://stepshot.net/
